Package com.gendra.suggestion.service

Class SuggestionService

java.lang.Object
com.gendra.suggestion.service.SuggestionService
@Service public class SuggestionService extends Object
The SuggestionService class provides methods for generating location suggestions based on a user query and geographical coordinates.

This service uses data from a CitiesReaderRepository to calculate and return suggestions.

    Constructs a new SuggestionService with the specified repository.

  • Constructor Details

    • SuggestionService

      @Autowired public SuggestionService(CitiesReaderRepository repository)
      Constructs a new SuggestionService with the specified repository.
      Parameters:
      repository - The repository to retrieve city data from.

  • Method Details

    • getSuggestions

      public List<Suggestion> getSuggestions(String query, Double latitude, Double longitude)
      Retrieves a list of location suggestions based on the provided query, latitude, and longitude.
      Parameters:
      query - The user's search query.
      latitude - The latitude of the user's current location (nullable).
      longitude - The longitude of the user's current location (nullable).
      Returns:
      A list of Suggestion objects sorted by relevance.

    • calculateScore

      public double calculateScore(City city, Double latitude, Double longitude)
      Calculates the relevance score for a city based on its proximity to the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      city - The city for which to calculate the score.
      latitude - The latitude of the reference point.
      longitude - The longitude of the reference point.
      Returns:
      The relevance score for the city.

    • calculateDistanceScore

      public double calculateDistanceScore(City city, Double latitude, Double longitude)
      Calculates the distance-based score for a city relative to the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      city - The city for which to calculate the score.
      latitude - The latitude of the reference point.
      longitude - The longitude of the reference point.
      Returns:
      The distance-based score for the city.

    • findByNameContaining

      public Set<City> findByNameContaining(List<CityDAO> cities, String query)
      Finds a set of cities whose names, ASCII names, or alternative names match the given query.
      Parameters:
      cities - The list of cities to search within.
      query - The user's search query.
      Returns:
      A set of City objects matching the query.

    • matchesQuery

      public boolean matchesQuery(CityDAO cityDAO, String query)
      Checks if a given city file matches the user's query (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      cityDAO - The city file to check.
      query - The user's search query.
      Returns:
      true if the city file matches the query, false otherwise.
